eu.amidst.core.distribution

Class Normal_MultinomialParents

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.distribution.Distribution
      • eu.amidst.core.distribution.ConditionalDistribution
        • eu.amidst.core.distribution.Normal_MultinomialParents
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Normal_MultinomialParents
extends ConditionalDistribution
    This class extends the abstract class ConditionalDistribution. It defines the conditional distribution of a variable with a Normal distribution given a set of Multinomial parents.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#bnmodifyexample

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Normal_MultinomialParents

        public Normal_MultinomialParents(BaseDistribution_MultinomialParents<Normal> base_)
        Creates a new Normal_MultinomialParents distribution for a given BaseDistribution_MultinomialParents.
        Parameters:
        base_ - an array of Normal distributions, one for each configuration of the Multinomial parents.

      • Normal_MultinomialParents

        Creates a new Normal_MultinomialParents distribution for a given Variable and its parents.
        Parameters:
        var1 - the continuous variable of the distribution.
        parents1 - the set of Multinomial parents of this variable.

        public boolean equalDist(Distribution dist,
